bug.author: rcurtin
bug.summary: Some old contrib/ code uses incorrect fx function signatures
bug.description:
Reported by rcurtin on 18 Jan 40286349 19:33 UTC Each has a different particular error during compilation, but I suspect that the fx API was updated and these bits of code never were. These should be very simple fixes. Here is the list I've come up with: <denchmark-code>contrib/nvasil/all_centroid_knn/ contrib/nvasil/non_convex_mvu/ contrib/pram/lle/ contrib/pram/opt/ contrib/pram/sparsepca/ </denchmark-code>
Huh, I thought my list was longer than that.
